title: Informer for Android Wear Smartwatch notifications
summary: Instant replies, missed calls, notification history for Android Wear SmartWatch

descriptionHTML:
Notification history, missed calls, message replies, received images and vibration patterns for your Android Wear watches.

INSTRUCTIONS
After installing Informer on your phone, launch it and grant permission to access notifications by selecting the first setting "Service is OFF. Turn it ON?".
For ANDROID WEAR 2.0: Please install Informer from Play Market both on your phone and on the watch.
For Xiaomi MIUI: Please enable Informer in the phone Settings - Permissions - Auto start.

Informer improves the way you handle messages on your Android Wear SmartWatch.
It shows the history of notifications and missed calls.
Informer for Android Wear brings instant cards (better than notifications) which allow you to reply to messages with a single tap.
You will be able to view images sent via WhatsApp, Viber, Facebook Messenger, Telegram, Threema right on your smartwatch.
You can also set the night silence hours and sleep well without disruption (even your phone will be turned into silent mode until morning).

PREMIUM membership gives you extra options:
✔ Vibration patterns to feel contacts
✔ Timer to close cards automatically
✔ Use SMS to reply to phone calls
✔ Select apps from installed list
✔ Mute selected chats

Please join our community for Android Wear users:
https://plus.google.com/communities/101290640261861345812

Informer supports all Android Wear smart watches:
✔ Sony SmartWatch 3
✔ Huawei Watch (1/2)
✔ Moto 360 (1/2/Sport)
✔ LG G Watch (R)
✔ LG Watch (Urban/Urban 2/Sport/Style)
✔ Asus ZenWatch (1/2/3)
✔ Casio Smart Outdoor Watch (WSD-F10/WSD-F20)
✔ Fossil Q (Founder/Marshal/Wander)
✔ Nixon Mission
✔ Polar M600
✔ Tag Heuer Connected
✔ New Balance RunIQ
✔ Movado Connect
✔ Mobvoi Ticwatch
✔ Samsung Gear Live
✔ Samsung Gear 2 (Android Wear)
✔ Michael Kors Access
✔ Montblanc Summit
✔ SKAGEN
comments: It works like a charm after I installed it on my watch as well.
Excellent support and really good app with my Sony smart watch 3

Awesome! This is the only Android wear app out there that is able to expand all my notifications. I really hate bundled notifications on my watch for some apps, and this apps solves all my problems. Paid for the premium and totally worth it! Thanks dev! ðŸ˜Š
I tried it but it doesn't do much for $10 that the stock apps can't do but maybe they'll have a sale sometime soon ðŸ˜‰
